'''Masked Weasel''' is a type of beast. It can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor animals can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

==Drops==
{{Card|Raw Meat|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry in the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Can be found north of [[The Dune of Magma]] and north of [[The Mausoleum of King Deshret]].
